name: qa-testing-conferences
description: Curated list of software testing conferences worldwide sorted by country

scripts.patch: npm version patch -m "Bumped up package version to %s" && git push && git push origin --tags && npm publish
scripts.minor: npm version minor -m "Bumped up package version to %s" && git push && git push origin --tags && npm publish
scripts.major: npm version major -m "Bumped up package version to %s" && git push && git push origin --tags && npm publish

author: Dmytro Shpakovskyi
